wake_up.speaker: Narrator
wake_up.text: Dawn breaks over Dragon Haven. Your first full day running the cafe begins.

morning_tasks.speaker: Narrator
morning_tasks.text: The cafe needs preparation before opening. You'll need to gather ingredients, prepare the kitchen, and get ready for customers.

tutorial_prompt.speaker: Mother
tutorial_prompt.text: (A note on the counter) 'Start simple, dear. The meadow beyond the cafe has wild herbs and vegetables. Gather what you need, then come back and cook something nice.'

explore_hint.speaker: Narrator
explore_hint.text: Press E to explore the surrounding zones. Gather ingredients to cook recipes. Press I to check your inventory.
